h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: Look for the four electric pots that crackle and sparkle on the back of the dragon. You’ll want to aim a large heavy hit directly on these whenever possible. Targeting them isn’t always easy, as you can only really lock on to the center of his body, which may not specifically point you at the pots on his back.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Look for the four electric pots that crackle and sparkle on the back of the dragon. You’ll want to aim a large heavy hit directly on these whenever possible. Targeting them isn’t always easy, as you can only really lock on to the center of his body, which may not specifically point you at the pots on his back.
